name: Push-Ups
description: A basic bodyweight exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that primarily targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: An upper chest exercise performed on an inclined bench to target the upper portion of the pectorals.

name: Decline Bench Press
description: Targets the lower chest by performing the bench press on a decline bench.

name: Chest Flyes
description: An isolation exercise that stretches and contracts the chest muscles.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: A versatile exercise that works the chest and back muscles.

name: Cable Crossovers
description: An isolation exercise that targets the inner chest muscles.

name: Pec Deck Machine
description: An isolation machine exercise focusing on the chest muscles.

name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
description: Targets the upper chest muscles by performing flyes on an incline bench.

name: Decline Push-Ups
description: A variation of push-ups that targets the lower chest muscles.

name: Wide-Grip Push-Ups
description: Targets the outer chest muscles with a wide grip during push-ups.

name: Svend Press
description: An isolation chest exercise using a plate to target the inner chest muscles.

name: Resistance Band Chest Press
description: A resistance band exercise that mimics the chest press motion.

name: Single-Arm Chest Fly
description: An isolation exercise that targets the chest with unilateral movement.

name: Medicine Ball Chest Pass
description: A plyometric exercise that enhances explosive chest strength.

name: Bicep Curls
description: A basic exercise that isolates the biceps by curling the weight up towards the shoulder.

name: Hammer Curls
description: A variation of curls that targets the brachialis and biceps muscles using a neutral grip.

name: Concentration Curls
description: An isolation exercise that focuses on the peak of the bicep muscle.

name: Cable Curls
description: A cable machine exercise that provides constant tension on the biceps throughout the movement.

name: Preacher Curls
description: Performed on a preacher bench, this exercise isolates the lower part of the biceps.

name: EZ-Bar Curls
description: A variation of the curl using an EZ-bar to reduce strain on the wrists while targeting the biceps.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curls
description: Performed on an incline bench, this exercise stretches the biceps for a more intense contraction.

name: Reverse Curls
description: A variation of the curl that targets the brachioradialis and biceps with a pronated grip.

name: Spider Curls
description: An exercise performed on an incline bench to target the biceps in a stretched position.

name: Zottman Curls
description: A compound movement that targets both the biceps and forearms by rotating the wrists during the curl.

name: Overhead Cable Curls
description: Performed using a cable machine, this exercise targets the biceps with the arms positioned overhead.

name: Chin-Ups
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the biceps and back muscles.

name: Barbell Curls
description: A classic exercise that uses a barbell to isolate and build the biceps.

name: Band Curls
description: A resistance band exercise that mimics the bicep curl motion.

name: Cross-Body Hammer Curls
description: A variation of hammer curls that targets the brachialis and biceps by curling the weight across the body.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps by dipping down and pushing up using parallel bars or a bench.

name: Tricep Pushdowns
description: An exercise performed using a cable machine to push down a bar or rope, targeting the triceps.

name: Skull Crushers
description: An isolation exercise performed with an EZ-bar or dumbbells to target the triceps by lowering the weight towards the forehead.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
description: A tricep exercise performed by extending a dumbbell or bar overhead.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: A variation of the bench press that targets the triceps by using a narrow grip on the barbell.

name: Diamond Push-Ups
description: A push-up variation that targets the triceps by placing the hands close together in a diamond shape.

name: Tricep Kickbacks
description: An isolation exercise where the triceps are targeted by extending the arm backwards while holding a dumbbell.

name: Reverse Grip Tricep Pushdowns
description: A variation of the tricep pushdown using a reverse grip to target the triceps.

name: Rope Tricep Extensions
description: A cable machine exercise that targets the triceps by extending the arms downwards using a rope attachment.

name: Tricep Bench Press
description: A bench press variation focusing on triceps by reducing the range of motion.

name: Single-Arm Tricep Extensions
description: An isolation exercise where the triceps are targeted by extending one arm at a time.

name: Tricep Push-Up
description: A variation of the push-up that targets the triceps by keeping the elbows close to the body.

name: Bench Dips
description: An exercise that targets the triceps by dipping down and pushing up using a bench.

name: Resistance Band Tricep Pushdowns
description: An exercise that targets the triceps by pushing down a resistance band.

name: Lying Tricep Extensions
description: A tricep exercise performed lying down, targeting the triceps by extending the arms overhead.

name: Pull-Ups
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the back muscles by pulling the body up to a bar.

name: Lat Pulldowns
description: An exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi by pulling down a bar towards the chest.

name: Bent Over Rows
description: An exercise that targets the back by rowing a barbell or dumbbell while bent over at the waist.

name: Deadlifts
description: A compound exercise that targets the entire back by lifting a barbell from the ground.

name: T-Bar Rows
description: An exercise that targets the back by rowing a T-bar attachment towards the body.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Rows
description: An exercise that targets the back by rowing a dumbbell with one arm while supporting the body with the other arm.

name: Seated Cable Rows
description: An exercise that targets the back by rowing a cable attachment while seated.

name: Hyperextensions
description: An exercise that targets the lower back by extending the spine while lying face down on a hyperextension bench.

name: Face Pulls
description: An exercise that targets the upper back and shoulders by pulling a cable attachment towards the face.

name: Inverted Rows
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the back by pulling the chest towards a bar while lying underneath it.

name: Straight Arm Pulldowns
description: An exercise that targets the lats by pulling a cable bar down with straight arms.

name: Good Mornings
description: An exercise that targets the lower back and hamstrings by bending at the waist while holding a barbell on the shoulders.

name: Renegade Rows
description: An exercise that targets the back by rowing dumbbells while in a push-up position.

name: Wide Grip Pull-Ups
description: A variation of the pull-up that targets the back by using a wide grip on the bar.

name: Superman Exercise
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the lower back by raising the arms and legs while lying face down.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing a barbell or dumbbells overhead.

name: Lateral Raises
description: An exercise that targets the side deltoids by lifting dumbbells out to the sides.

name: Front Raises
description: An exercise that targets the front deltoids by lifting dumbbells straight in front of the body.

name: Reverse Flyes
description: An exercise that targets the rear deltoids by flying dumbbells out to the sides while bent over.

name: Arnold Press
description: A variation of the shoulder press that involves rotating the palms from facing the body to facing forward.

name: Upright Rows
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders and traps by pulling a barbell or dumbbells up towards the chin.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing dumbbells overhead while seated or standing.

name: Cable Lateral Raises
description: An exercise that targets the side deltoids by lifting a cable attachment out to the side.

name: Seated Dumbbell Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing dumbbells overhead while seated.

name: Single-Arm Landmine Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing a barbell attached to a landmine with one arm.

name: Face Pulls
description: An exercise that targets the upper back and shoulders by pulling a cable attachment towards the face.

name: Push Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders by using a leg drive to press a barbell overhead.

name: Military Press
description: An exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing a barbell overhead with a strict form.

name: Rear Delt Flyes
description: An exercise that targets the rear deltoids by flying dumbbells out to the sides while bent over.

name: Front Plate Raises
description: An exercise that targets the front deltoids by lifting a weight plate straight in front of the body.

name: Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the entire lower body by bending the knees and lowering the body into a squat position.

name: Lunges
description: An exercise that targets the legs and glutes by stepping forward into a lunge position and lowering the body.

name: Leg Press
description: An exercise that targets the legs by pressing a weighted platform away from the body with the feet.

name: Hamstring Curls
description: An exercise that targets the hamstrings by curling the legs towards the glutes while lying face down on a machine.

name: Leg Extensions
description: An exercise that targets the quadriceps by extending the legs while seated on a machine.

name: Calf Raises
description: An exercise that targets the calves by raising the heels off the ground while standing.

name: Romanian Deadlifts
description: An exercise that targets the hamstrings and glutes by lowering a barbell down the front of the legs while maintaining a straight back.

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
description: An exercise that targets the legs by performing a split squat with the rear foot elevated on a bench.

name: Step-Ups
description: An exercise that targets the legs by stepping onto a platform or bench with one foot at a time.

name: Glute Bridges
description: An exercise that targets the glutes and hamstrings by lifting the hips off the ground while lying on the back.

name: Sumo Squats
description: A variation of the squat that targets the inner thighs and glutes by performing a wide-stance squat.

name: Hack Squats
description: An exercise that targets the legs by performing a squat motion on a hack squat machine.

name: Sissy Squats
description: An exercise that targets the quadriceps by squatting with the body leaning back and keeping the knees over the toes.

name: Box Jumps
description: A plyometric exercise that targets the legs by jumping onto a sturdy box or platform.

name: Goblet Squats
description: A squat variation where a weight is held at chest level with both hands while performing the squat.

name: Crunches
description: An exercise that targets the upper abdominal muscles by curling the torso towards the knees while lying on the back.

name: Planks
description: An exercise that targets the core muscles by holding a position similar to a push-up for a specified time.

name: Leg Raises
description: An exercise that targets the lower abdominal muscles by lifting the legs while lying on the back.

name: Russian Twists
description: An exercise that targets the obliques by twisting the torso from side to side while seated.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: An exercise that targets the abdominal muscles and obliques by alternating knee-to-elbow motions while lying on the back.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: An exercise that targets the core and cardiovascular system by alternating knee drives while holding a push-up position.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
description: An exercise that targets the lower abs by raising the legs while hanging from a pull-up bar.

name: V-Ups
description: An exercise that targets the entire core by lifting the legs and torso simultaneously to form a V shape.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: An exercise that targets the lower abs and hip flexors by alternating leg kicks while lying on the back.

name: Sit-Ups
description: An exercise that targets the abdominal muscles by lifting the torso from a lying position to a sitting position.

name: Side Planks
description: An exercise that targets the obliques and entire core by holding a plank position on one side of the body.

name: Toe Touches
description: An exercise that targets the upper abs by reaching for the toes while lying on the back and lifting the legs.

name: Reverse Crunches
description: An exercise that targets the lower abs by curling the hips towards the torso while lying on the back.

name: Ab Wheel Rollouts
description: An exercise that targets the entire core by rolling an ab wheel forward and backward while maintaining a straight back.

name: Dead Bugs
description: An exercise that targets the core by extending opposite arms and legs while lying on the back and maintaining a neutral spine.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump to provide a high-intensity workout.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic exercise that targets the core and cardiovascular system by alternating knee drives while holding a push-up position.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves jumping with arms and legs spread wide and then returning to the starting position.

name: Bear Crawls
description: An exercise that targets the entire body by crawling on hands and feet while keeping the hips low.

name: Kettlebell Swings
description: An exercise that targets the hips, glutes, and core by swinging a kettlebell from between the legs to shoulder height.

name: Clean and Press
description: A compound exercise that involves lifting a barbell from the ground to shoulder height and then pressing it overhead.

name: Man Makers
description: A full-body exercise that combines a push-up, row, and squat with a dumbbell press for a high-intensity workout.

name: Battle Ropes
description: An exercise that targets the upper body and core by rapidly moving ropes up and down or side to side.

name: Thrusters
description: A compound exercise that combines a squat with an overhead press using dumbbells or a barbell.

name: Medicine Ball Slams
description: An exercise that targets the entire body by raising a medicine ball overhead and then slamming it to the ground.

name: High Knees
description: A cardiovascular exercise that involves running in place while lifting the knees as high as possible.

name: Squat to Press
description: A compound exercise that combines a squat with an overhead press using dumbbells or a barbell.

name: Plank to Push-Up
description: An exercise that involves transitioning from a plank position to a push-up and back to engage the core and upper body.

name: Tire Flips
description: A full-body exercise that involves flipping a large tire from one side to the other, engaging multiple muscle groups.

name: Farmer’s Walk
description: An exercise that targets the grip, shoulders, and core by walking while holding heavy weights in each hand.
